title: (x) Why god, oh why - ???, ITC Bradley Hand {Mark S}
content: The handwriting is ITC Bradley Hand. Not sure what the other one is (not sure I _want_ to know).
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: If you don't need an exact match try [Perceval](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052340/http:/www.2rebels.com/pages/cframe.html) and \*gulp\* slant the regular, because the italic is more off. I've got a nagging feeling that the face in your scan exists, because I think I recognize that awful crossbar on the "t" in combination with those weirdo thick/thin strokes.
